Assam Rifles Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 69 Rifleman/ Riflewomen Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 16:31 IST
 Assam Rifles
 69 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Nagaland |  Salary : 20,000 to 100,000




FOLLOW

The Assam Rifles has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 69 Riflemen/Riflewomen Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass can apply for the Assam Rifles Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Nagaland.

Assam Rifles Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Riflemen/ Riflewomen	69	10th Pass

Assam Rifles Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 23 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For OBC candidates: 05 Years.
For SC/ST candidates: 10 Years.

Assam Rifles Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on

Physical Standard Test.
Motor Ability Test.
Field Trail.
Medical Examination.

Assam Rifles Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For SC/ST/Women candidates: NIL.
For General/OBC candidates: Rs. 100/-.

Assam Rifles Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 20,000/- per month
The maximum salary: Rs. 1,00,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the Assam Rifles Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the Assam Rifles Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	16-08-2025
Closing date	15-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
